GSD.description:
Bluetooth: Fix use after free in hci_send_acl

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 643a6c26bd32e339d00ad97b8822b6db009e803c. For more details please see the references link.
